[[His]100-he Cinderella]101-his cinderella is n’t looking for a fairy tale … [Alicia Forkes]27-alicia went to [a trendy club]102-a trendy club looking for a way to forget [her]27-alicia troubles , and [she]27-alicia found that in the arms of [the gorgeous man who swept [her]27-alicia off of [her]27-alicia feet … and into one of the hottest encounters [she]27-alicia ’d ever had in [her]27-alicia life]103-the gorgeous man who swept her off of her feet … and into one of the hottest encounters she ’d ever had in her life . [He]100-he ’s [the guy who broke [her]27-alicia heart when [they]107-they were teens]106-the guy who broke her heart when they were teens , an experience [she]27-alicia does n’t plan on repeating . [Prince Leo]28-leo ca n’t believe [he]28-leo ’s finally found [the woman [he]28-leo ’s loved]108-the woman he ’s loved for years , and [she]108-the woman he ’s loved wants nothing to do with [him]28-leo . Chapter Two [He]0-his led [her]193-her across [the nightclub]194-the nightclub , glancing over [his]0-his shoulder at [her]193-her . [His]0-his brown hair was even darker on [the dim nightclub dance floor]195-the dim nightclub dance floor , lending [him]0-his a mysterious air , especially since the mask hid most of [his]0-his features . It reminded [her]193-her of the scene in the Phantom of the Opera where [the Phantom]174-the phantom is leading [Christine]37-christine down to [[his]174-the phantom lair]197-his lair , and [Christine]37-christine is vibrating with nerves and excitement . Chapter Seven Three days . Three long , agonizing , slow , torturous days . That was how long [Alicia]27-alicia had been in [[his]28-leo home]486-his home . Once , zero , zilch , nada . That ’s how many times [he]28-leo ’d seen [her]27-alicia since [her]27-alicia arrival . Every day [he]28-leo sent [her]27-alicia an invitation to join [him]28-leo for supper . Chapter Thirteen That had been a close call . [He]28-leo ’d been so careful not to press [her]27-alicia , not to try to sweep [her]27-alicia away in [his]28-leo arms again , with kisses and broken promises . [He]28-leo ’d done that to [her]27-alicia once , and [he]28-leo refused to do it again . [She]27-alicia ’d been clear when [she]27-alicia ’d agreed to spend time with [him]28-leo that all [she]27-alicia wanted from [him]28-leo was friendship . And [he]28-leo was okay with that . But if [he]28-leo wanted any chance at something more than a night in bed together , [he]28-leo had to play [his]28-leo cards right . Time was running out , and [she]27-alicia ’d be going back to [America]4-america soon , but that did n’t have to be the end of [their]781-their relationship . Not this time . This time , [he]28-leo ’d fucking write . And text . And call . If [he]28-leo had [his]28-leo way , this friendship was the start of a lifelong commitment of some sort — though [he]28-leo was n’t sure what type of relationship [he]28-leo was looking for yet . Just … something more . But if [he]28-leo kissed [her]27-alicia , all of that would be ruined . Because if [their]781-their lips met , there was no way in hell [he]28-leo ’d be able to stop there . [He]28-leo ’d need to kiss all of [her]27-alicia . Every damn inch . And then [she]27-alicia ’d push [him]28-leo away after . [Leo]28-leo was trained to be rational , level - headed , smart , cautious , and kind in all things . [[His]28-leo father]250-his father taught [him]28-leo to never take unnecessary risks or hope for the impossible , and to always think of [others]1492-others ’ wellbeing before [his]28-leo own . When it came to [Alicia Forkes]27-alicia , though , [he]28-leo was [the biggest fool to ever walk on [this side of [the planet]786-the planet]785-this side of the planet]784-the biggest fool to ever walk on this side of the planet . Rational decisions did n’t exist with [her]27-alicia . There was just hope . Stupid , foolish , ignorant hope . [He]28-leo was determined to keep [her]27-alicia in [his]28-leo life this time . [We]1746-we do n’t know anything yet . ”[27-alicia] “ Yeah . Okay . ”[27-alicia] Carefully , [he]28-leo withdrew [his]28-leo hand and struggled to [his]28-leo feet . [Alicia]27-alicia stood , too , pulling [her]27-alicia shirt back down and running [her]27-alicia fingers through [her]27-alicia hair . [He]28-leo watched [her]27-alicia , not moving , because once [he]28-leo did , [he]28-leo would get to [[his]28-leo father]250-his father ’s bedside and maybe find out that [he]28-leo ’d lost [the only person on [this planet]811-this planet who truly loved [him]28-leo]810-the only person on this planet who truly loved him . [The man who had taught [him]28-leo how to be [a man]340-a man]812-the man who had taught him how to be a man . [[His]28-leo father]250-his father . [They]815-they silently took [their]815-they skates off , and [he]28-leo buttoned up [his]28-leo shirt . After [he]28-leo grabbed [his]28-leo coat , [Alicia]27-alicia reached out and entwined [her]27-alicia fingers with [his]28-leo , much like [he]28-leo had done to [her]27-alicia earlier , and squeezed reassuringly . “ Do n’t read too much into it . [I]28-leo just want to make sure [you]27-alicia do n’t fall . ”[28-leo] [He]28-leo locked eyes with [her]27-alicia . “ [I]28-leo ca n’t lose [him]28-leo , [Alicia]27-alicia . [I]28-leo ’m not ready . ”[28-leo] “ [We]1747-we ’re never ready , but [you]28-leo have n’t lost [him]28-leo yet . [[His]28-leo father]250-his father was gone .

Chapter Fourteen By the time [they]817-they got to [the hospital]818-the hospital , [Alicia]27-alicia ’s heart was pounding and breaking simultaneously . Seeing the pain , the fear , in [Leo]28-leo ’s eyes was tearing [her]27-alicia in half , and [she]27-alicia wanted to make [him]28-leo feel better — [she]27-alicia just did n’t know how . Holding [Leo]28-leo ’s hand in [her]27-alicia lap , running [her]27-alicia thumb over the back of [his]28-leo knuckles , [she]27-alicia stole a quick look at [him]28-leo . [He]28-leo stared out the window , blankly , at [the hospital where [[his]28-leo father]250-his father had been taken]819-the hospital where his father had been taken . [[His]28-leo possibly dead father]821-his possibly dead father . If [he]28-leo was gone , [Leo]28-leo would feel a pain that [she]27-alicia would never wish upon [anyone]1301-anyone , not even [[her]27-alicia biggest enemy]823-her biggest enemy . Losing [[her]27-alicia father]328-her father had literally changed [her]27-alicia life . It had ruined [her]27-alicia . Destroyed [her]27-alicia . And for [Leo]28-leo , not only would [he]28-leo endure the loss of [a parent]1710-a parent , but the loss of [a ruler]239-a ruler , too . [He]28-leo ’d become [a king]1703-a king . [He]28-leo would n’t have time to grieve , or suffer in silence . [He]28-leo ’d have to comfort [a whole country]828-a whole country instead . [Her]27-alicia heart hurt for [him]28-leo . [She]27-alicia covered [their]829-their hands with [her]27-alicia other one , ignoring the warning bells going off in [her]27-alicia head when [he]28-leo clung to [her]27-alicia as if [she]27-alicia kept [him]28-leo grounded in the midst of all of this pain . “ Shit , ”[28-leo] [he]28-leo muttered . “ [The reporters]1749-the reporters are already here . ”[28-leo] [She]27-alicia glanced past [his]28-leo shoulder , and sure enough , there were at least fifteen newsmen out there , with cameras and microphones primed and ready for [him]28-leo to get out of [the car]480-the car . “ What do [you]27-alicia want to do ? ”[28-leo] [He]28-leo frowned , not speaking . Chapter Eighteen Sometime between being shoved in between [two huge , smelly men]1016-two huge , smelly men , and [the flight attendant]1017-the flight attendant ’s announcement that [the airplane]1018-the airplane would be taking off five minutes ahead of time due to prompt boarding of [the passengers]1019-the passengers , [Alicia]27-alicia admitted to [herself]27-alicia that [she]27-alicia ’d made a huge , stupid , colossal mistake . That was all [he]28-leo ’d been asking for , and [she]27-alicia ’d made sure to crush [his]28-leo soul . Those stupid letters . Epilogue Six months later [Alicia]27-alicia stood in front of the mirror in [[her]27-alicia bedroom]491-her bedroom , staring at [herself]27-alicia with wide eyes , parted lips , and so many diamonds on [her]27-alicia that it was ridiculous .
